install.name: FLEXIcontent - CORE property
install.author: ggppdk
install.description: Item Form CORE property placer Plugin for FLEXIcontent. This field is used to define the place that the CORE property will appear in Item Form. This is done by ordering it in fields manager, while Content Type filter is enabled

field.default: For placing: title, state, created, createdby, modified, modified, please use the existing CORE fields

field.name: props_type
field.label: Property type
field.description: Select the CORE property or CORE property group (normally these will appear in a TAB by default), that you want to place in item form

field.name: prefix
field.label: Prefix
field.description: Enter the custom HTML code that will be placed before the fields

field.name: suffix
field.label: Suffix
field.description: Enter the custom HTML code that will be placed after the fields
